intro: I'm a Junior Computer Science Major currently attending a University somewhere in Florida. My ultimate goal is to learn full stack web development, master C++, and Artificial Intelligence at some point.
about: I started programing at 15 years old when I wanted to learn how to make a discord bot to show off to my friends. I went on youtube and learned how to make a discord bot in javascript. Despite my first bot having many issues due to my poor knowledge of javascript and no knowledge of data structures, I was hooked.

I'm currently working towards my bachelor's to see where I stand amongst CS majors and to push myself beyond my current limits as a software developer. My goal is to graduate by 2025 with my degree and might pursue a master's afterward.
Besides programming, I like to play strategy games and make memes/videos for others to enjoy. I also make spread sheets as well with some backend code implemented thxs to Google App Script.
